General.Name: Watts SA
General.Description: Watt's S.A. manufactures and sells food products primarily in Chile. The company provides fruit products, such as fresh squeezed fruit juice, nectars, jams, candies, and fruit concentrates; and oils, margarine, and butter. It also offers dairy products, including liquid and powdered milk, cheese, butter, milk drinks and creams, lactose free milk, and soymilk; frozen foods comprising fruits, vegetables, mixes, and ready meals, as well as sautéed, pre-fried potatoes, legumes, and bases for cooking; pasta; and wines. The company offers its products under the Watt's, Loncoleche S.A., Calo, Chef, Belmont, Sureña, Wasil, Yogu Yogu, and other brands. It also exports its products to approximately 30 countries primarily in the American continent. Watt's S.A. was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in San Bernardo, Chile.
General.Address: Av. Pres Jorge Alessandri Nº 10.501, San Bernardo, Chile, 8060052
